name: No Touching & Royal Boop
description:
Poke your favorite pony in "No Touching," or boop your favorite princess in "Royal Boop!"
Two silly My Little Pony micro-games are now finally available in HTML5.

CONTROLS:
Just tap and hold to poke (or boop) and observe the reactions. That's it.

CREDITS:
Chubby pony designs: https://askmlcblobs.tumblr.com/
Fluffle Puff: https://www.deviantart.com/mixermike622 & https://askflufflepuff.tumblr.com/
